articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: Christmas Eve Wildfire in Chile Destroys Dozens of Homes
articles.description: Firefighters struggled to control the blaze on a hillside in the city of Valparaíso.
articles.content:
A Christmas Eve wildfire raged through a residential area on the outskirts of the Chilean city of Valparaíso, engulfing houses and prompting evacuation orders. 
As of late Tuesday night, the blaze had destroyed more than 120 houses and was only partially und… [+437 chars]
